channel.title: Just another data blog
channel.description: Recent content on Just another data blog

item.title: Digital voting and blockchain, good or bad idea?
item.description: There have been some attempts to introduce digital in voting and more generally in the democratic process. Could blockchain enhance digital-based voting and help overcome some related challenges such as security?

item.title: Hacking Disinformation with the European External Action Service
item.description: I recently took part in the Disinformation Horizon Hackathon organised by the East StratCom Task Force dedicated to the fight against Russian disinformation using data.

item.title: Welcome to my blog!
item.description: Hi there, I just created this blog to showcase my data science projects. This is my first ever blog post!

item.title: About
item.description: Alix Dumoulin, 21 ðŸ‡«ðŸ‡· living in ðŸ‡¬ðŸ‡§ Hi, welcome to my blog! I am an Applied Social Data Science student at The London School of Economics and I created this blog to share my projects and some (hopefully) interesting content about social data science and computational social science. I am also the co-founder of a start-up called ethi: we are building a tool for people to reclaim, control, and use their personal data, learn more about it here!
